text:
Liga
Real Madrid: Zidane compares Benzema to Cristiano Ronado!
The French striker of the White House, Karim Benzema between a little more in the history of football and Real Madrid. Yesterday evening, the Merengue won the score of 6-0 against Galatasaray with a double and a decisive pass to the attention of Rodrygo by the French.
07 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Nils Constant



In a press conference after the overwhelming victory of his team, Zinedine Zidane, praised his player and said the figures spoke for Karim Benzema: "His figures speak for him. Since the departure of Cristiano Ronaldo, only one thing has changed is that Karim has become more mature "The French coach has not hesitated to say that Benzema was at the same level as Cristiano Ronaldo in the history of this club .




Benzema outclasses Di Stefano




Zinedine Zidane + 21 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The Madrid center forward surpassed former legend Di Stefano in scoring his 50th league goal. His coach showed his satisfaction following these two achievements of the evening: "I am very happy for Karim. It is true that he has passed a legend of this club Di Stefano. He does wonderful things and we have to take advantage of that. "
Karim Benzema now knows what his compatriot thinks about his statistics and his contribution to the Real Madrid game.
